key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party foundries
Market volatility tied to the cyclical semiconductor industry
Legal challenges including class action lawsuits and patent disputes
Intense competition from larger semiconductor players
Technological shifts requiring continuous R&D investment
controversies: Securities class action lawsuits related to IPO and financial disclosures
Patent disputes, such as the case filed by Cedar Lane Technologies Inc.
governance_issues: Legal challenges involving the CFO as a defendant in class action lawsuits
